Which of the following is the BEST indication that an organization needs to perform a privacy impact assessment (PIA)?

choices.D: New personal information categories are being collected about customers.
choices.C: The privacy practices are being reviewed by clients.
choices.B: An inventory of personal information is reported to stakeholders.
choices.A: The privacy policy is included in an online training course.

discussion.content:

A Privacy Impact Assessment (PIA) is most warranted when an organization begins collecting new personal information categories, as this introduces potential new privacy risks that must be evaluated and mitigated

questions.question_text: An organization has developed a tracking system to better understand customer purchasing behavior. Prior to deployment it is discovered that the consumer privacy policy does not properly convey that customer purchases may be tracked in this way. Which of the following is the BEST course of action?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Delaying the launch until the privacy policy and notice are properly updated ensures compliance, protects customer trust, and aligns with privacy regulations and best practices

choices.C: Delay launching the system until the privacy policy and notice have been updated.
choices.A: Create a script for customer service representatives to describe the change when customers call.
choices.B: Include a notice in the purchase confirmation that informs customers of the tracking.
choices.D: When the system is launched, collect the data but do not analyze it until the policy and notice have been updated.
